title: Center for International Stabilization and Recovery (CISR) Core Services to Further PM/WRA Goals and Objectives
description: JMU Center for International Stabilization and Recovery (CISR) provides management training for organizations that clear land contaminated with explosive remnants of war (ERW), peer support training and capacity-building for disability rights organizations, and works with JMU faculty to develop tools and conduct research to help communities and individuals rebuild their lives in post-conflict environments.
